text: KLSN-LP was a low-power FM radio station in Oakley, California. that had served the East Contra Costa County area. KLSN-LP went on the air officially on January 28, 2017 with a classic hits format. In addition to music, KLSN-LP broadcast local sports from area high schools. == Current status == KLSN-LP went off the air in January 2018. On February 18th 2020, the station's Facebook page stated KLSN is off the air. ==References== ==External links== * * http://licensing.fcc.gov/cgi- bin/prod/cdbs/forms/prod/getimportletter_exh.cgi?import_letter_id=90097 LSN-LP LSN-LP Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in California
title: KLSN-LP
